Title: Plunging V-neck Red Carpet Gown with Necklace Draping

Featured-image: 8904-purple-plunging-v-neck-red-carpet-gown-with-necklace-draping_p.jpg

----

Description: No need for jewelry with this show stopper. The floor length red carpet gown is classic and simple but the neckline is brilliant. There are beading and sequins that give the appearance of a draped necklace that covers the entire top of the gown. The back is equally stunning with the beading continuing on the sides while leaving the back open. Perfect for an elegant evening out.
